title: Which is the best place to get a PG around Amity University? - Quora

response.answer_text: HI, honestly speaking, there are many options to look for when it comes to finding a PG around Amity. Personally, i also went through a lot of trouble to find a good PG for myself, but maybe i can help you with this. I myself ended up at this great PG offered by Students inn and i recommend it to everyone, because of their top-notch services like 4 Times Meals (Veg & Non Veg) Prepared In House. All Day Maggi & Eggs (free) Live B-B-Q (2 times a week) 300mbps Unlimited Wifi 32" Personal T.V With Sky & Netflix (free) In House Commercial Gym Professional Laundry & Ironing (3 times a week unlimited Clothes Free) Daily Housekeeping Cafe Coffee Day Cappuccino Vending 24/7 (Free) Jacuzzi & Mist Terrace Lounge Gaming Zone With Pool Table, Air Hockey, T.T & PS4 Cool Dining Area Snacks Vending Machines for Your Midnight Cravings Fully Furnished Rooms with Attached Washrooms Biometric Entry Exits RFID Keyless Entry So all in all, I’m very positive about it and i think you will also like them, so maybe you can check their website or give them a call at 1800-3070-0055. Their team is very helpful and cooperative and can surely help you out. ALL THE BEST!

For PGs, you’ve got two options. Section 126, which is right next to Amity. Opposite Gate no. 2. Amity is in sector 125. It is also called Raipur Village and is located closest to the campus. A walk of 5 minutes or less. There are nearly 30 PGs, all all types., in Raipur village. For cheaper options you can look for PGs in Sector 44. It’s about 10 mins walk from the campus. You need to cross the foot-over-bridge which connects sector 125 to sector 44. There are many kith-type PGs available in sector 44 and it’s quite a lovely locality to live. I’ve lived for almost two years in PG in Sector 126 Raipur and then I shifted to a flat.
